item.title: Missing Drain cover, 2nd September
item.description:
The missing drain cover poses a hazard when people are trying to use the safe path, as Robert Street tunnel becomes busy due to increased transport. Needs urgent attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Robert Street, Waterloo, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Unlocked vehicle outside 254 Turney Road, Se21 7JP, 2nd September
item.description:
This BMW car (license plate EA62 XJV) is unlocked and has been abandoned here for the past 5+ weeks. It has been broken into a number of times - the glove box and inside have been rifled through and it is attracting a lot of antisocial behavoiur and attention

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Turney Road, Dulwich Village, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter down Midfield way, 2nd September
item.description:
Unfortunately some litter has been scattered after refuse collection. Please could this be picked up ASAP to prevent pests gathering and to tidy a public path. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 87, Midfield Way, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees growing out of front garden 160 Lynton Road causing hazard, 2nd September
item.description:
Trees growing out of front garden 160 Lynton Road, this is blocking the pavement and is causing a hazard, people having to walk in the road and wheelchair/pushchair uses unable to pass, this has been reported before! Covering the pavement/path and some limbs have had to be broken back so that walkers etc could pass by
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lynton Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
